landing.heroDescription: Track your child's development across six interconnected dimensions. From academics to character, from health to aspirations -- see the complete picture.
landing.dimensionsSubtitle: Every child is a complete human being. We track the dimensions that matter -- not just grades.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to intentional parenting.
landing.step1Description: Notice moments in your child's day -- a kind word, a solved puzzle, a prayer on time. Write a short observation and tag it to a dimension.
landing.step2Description: Watch patterns emerge on the radar chart. See which dimensions are thriving and which need more attention. Check milestones for their age.
landing.step3Description: Use insights to guide your parenting intentionally. Celebrate strengths, address gaps early, and build a rich record of your child's journey.
landing.ctaTitle: Every child deserves to be seen -- completely.
landing.ctaDescription: Start tracking your child's development for free. No credit card required.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to continue tracking your child's journey.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Start tracking your child's development for free.

about.title: About Mu'aththir
about.meaningText: "Mu'aththir" is an Arabic word meaning "influential" or "impactful." We believe that intentional, holistic parenting creates children who grow into adults of genuine impact. The platform embodies this belief by helping parents see the full picture of their child's development.
about.dimensionsSubtitle: Every child is more than a grade or a report card. Mu'aththir tracks six interconnected dimensions of development:
about.philosophyText: The six dimensions are not isolated silos. They are interconnected and mutually reinforcing:
about.ihsanDesc: (excellence in everything) connects academic goals to Islamic values
about.sabrDesc: (patience) connects behavioural self-regulation to Islamic character
about.shukrDesc: (gratitude) connects social-emotional awareness to Islamic practice
about.tawakkulDesc: (reliance on Allah while taking action) connects aspirational goals to Islamic faith
about.whoText: Mu'aththir is designed primarily for Muslim parents with children ages 3 to 16, but five of the six dimensions are universal. Any parent who wants a holistic, structured approach to child development will find value in this platform.

pricing.title: Simple, fair pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free with one child. Upgrade when your family grows.
pricing.freeDescription: Perfect for getting started with one child.
pricing.premiumDescription: For families who want the complete experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Mu'aththir takes your family's privacy seriously. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data and your children's data.
privacy.commitment1: All child data is encrypted at rest
privacy.commitment2: No analytics tracking pixels on pages that display child data
privacy.commitment3: No third-party data sharing under any circumstances
privacy.commitment4: GDPR compliant: data export within 24 hours, full deletion within 30 days
privacy.commitment5: COPPA compliant: all child data is treated as sensitive regardless of jurisdiction
privacy.dataCollectedText: We collect only the data necessary to provide the service: your name, email, and the observations and milestones you choose to record about your children. We do not collect data about your browsing habits, location, or contacts.
privacy.retentionText: Your data remains as long as your account is active. Deleted observations are soft-deleted and recoverable for 30 days, then permanently removed. Account deletion removes all data within 30 days.
privacy.fullPolicyNote: Full privacy policy details will be published before launch.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Mu'aththir, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
terms.serviceText: Mu'aththir is a child development tracking platform that allows parents to record observations, track milestones, and monitor progress across six developmental dimensions.
terms.accountText: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and all activity that occurs under your account. You must be at least 18 years old to create an account.
terms.dataText: You retain ownership of all content you create, including observations, child profiles, and milestone data. We do not claim any ownership over your data.
terms.useText: The platform is intended for tracking your own children's development. You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or to violate the rights of others.
terms.subscriptionText: Free accounts include one child profile. Premium subscriptions provide unlimited child profiles and additional features. Subscriptions can be cancelled at any time.
terms.fullTermsNote: Full terms of service will be published before launch.

dimensions.academicDesc: School and learning progress, grades, subject mastery, and curriculum milestones.
dimensions.social_emotionalDesc: Emotional intelligence, empathy, friendship skills, and conflict resolution.
dimensions.behaviouralDesc: Conduct, habits, discipline, self-regulation, and responsibility.
dimensions.aspirationalDesc: Goals, dreams, motivation, career exploration, and growth mindset.
dimensions.islamicDesc: Quran memorization, prayer habits, Islamic knowledge, and character (akhlaq).
dimensions.physicalDesc: Health metrics, fitness activities, motor skills, nutrition, and sleep.
